name: Planet Artemis
description:
This was made in 2 weeks for Rainbow Jam 18! 

You can use the left mouse button to do everything except to rotate items when you're placing them by selecting them (pressing z or x to do this). Rotating items doe not affect game play.

Life on Earth is no longer feasible. A new planet has been discovered. 
A safe space for humankind. If you can survive the journey.

It’s time to take the skies!

Your ship is the first to journey across the galaxy. You are in charge. 

CHOOSE WHAT TO TAKE WITH YOU
BUILD YOUR CREW
MAINTAIN YOUR SHIP
RESEARCH NEW TECHNOLOGIES
FEED YOUR FISH
and
SURVIVE

All in order to set up a new colony. 

You have until you arrive at your destination. It will take you 30 days, though it will feel more like 5 MINUTES until you arrive on

PLANET ARTEMIS.

Most of the art is from Kenney's.
